name: Billy's Baby Teeth
description: Billy is turning 26 next month and all of his baby teeth are still in his mouth. There's a simple procedure to fix this, but we need help raising the funds! We will be forever grateful if ya'll help Billy make this final transition into adulthood, tooth by tooth.

name: Help Little Ashley
description: Billy is turning 26 next month and all of his baby teeth are still in his mouth. There's a simple procedure to fix this, but we need help raising the funds! We will be forever grateful if ya'll help Billy make this final transition into adulthood, tooth by tooth.

name: Awaken The Kraken
description: This sea monster of giant proportions has been sited near Norway. We are lacking the funds to prepare the ancient ritual to summon such a powerful beast. The good news is that, thanks to this wonderful app we can finally release the Kraken!
